entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
